entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
